page.description: Adds a new pane to the Tab control.

argument.name: tabPaneLabel
argument.description: The label for the new pane.

argument.name: html
argument.description: The HTML to show in the pane.

page.discussion: Creates a new pane and adds it to the Tab control. The new pane is added at the end. If you want to add a pane to an Accordion control, use the [.addBand() method].
